speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing okay, thanks. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that confirmation. Can you also provide the address associated with the account for further verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I can confirm your identity. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. Let's set up the $100 payment for today. Which method would you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to use my credit card.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect. Please provide your credit card details so I can process this payment.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I’ll process that now. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
